definition: to weave/to knit/to plait/to braid/(fig.) to create (sth abstract, e.g. a dream, a lie etc)
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate

sentences.english: Nina needs nine knitting needles to knit naughty Nita's knickers nicely.
sentences.chinese: 妮娜需要九個編織針爲淘氣的尼特編織漂亮的燈籠褲。

sentences.english: Nina needs nine knitting needles to knit naughty Nita's knickers nicely.
sentences.chinese: 妮娜需要九個編織針爲淘氣的尼特編織漂亮的燈籠褲。

sentences.english: Indeed it was giraffe and deer that have woven the new dreamtime for all to partake in.
sentences.chinese: 的確，正是長頸鹿與鹿爲所有物種編織了這一新夢想。

sentences.english: Explanation: string of woven by a certain size of mesh structure flake braid.
sentences.chinese: 由網線編織成的一定尺寸網目結構的片狀編織物。

sentences.english: Explanation: string of woven by a certain size of mesh structure flake braid.
sentences.chinese: 由網線編織成的一定尺寸網目結構的片狀編織物。

sentences.english: Variable capacitor soldering joints made with RG213 coaxial braid.
sentences.chinese: 可變電容器的焊點與RG213同軸電纜編織的連接。

sentences.english: And on those keys, the music that you can make is infinite.
sentences.chinese: 由鍵盤編織的音樂纔是無限的。

sentences.english: This carpet is hand-made by traditional methods.
sentences.chinese: 這是傳統工藝手工編織的地毯。

sentences.english: Fabrics with a close weave are ideal for painting.
sentences.chinese: 編織緊密的布最適合作畫。

sentences.english: It is those lines of foot-prints that are weaved into fairy tales of my childhood.
sentences.chinese: 那一行行的腳印編織了我兒時春天的童話。

sentences.english: They sleep, they sleep inside a house that they them- selves have woven.
sentences.chinese: 它們在睡覺，就睡在自己親手編織的房子裏。

sentences.english: Maybe I'll finally learn to knit. Or cook something with more than three ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 也許我最終會學會編織，煮有三種以上配料的菜式。

sentences.english: The key is to weave relevant personal anecdotes into your writing.
sentences.chinese: 關鍵是要編織有關的個人軼事到你的寫作中。

sentences.english: This is why we go on, day after day, concocting fictions with utter seriousness .
sentences.chinese: 這就是我們爲何日復一日，如此嚴肅編織小說的原因。

sentences.english: These are the threads that weave the tapestry of humanity’s story.
sentences.chinese: 它們是編織人類歷史掛毯的絲線。

sentences.english: That's rib as in knitting(4) the cuff(5) of your sweater.
sentences.chinese: 我們所說的羅紋編織正是你毛衣袖口的織法。

definition: (of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
to conform (with)/to echo/to correlate well/(linguistics) agreement
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
to come up with an idea/generation of ideas/inspiration
vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
